/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the scene. Trees and bushes flank the street, their greenery contrasting with the urban architecture. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
